00018 #ifndef _EHISTOGRAM_H
00019 #define _EHISTOGRAM_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/paircalculator.h>
00023 #include <votca/tools/histogramnew.h>
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00026 
00032 class Ehistogram : public PairCalculator
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     Ehistogram() {};
00036     ~Ehistogram() {};
00037 
00038 //    const char *Description() { return "Histogram of site energy differences of neighbor list pairs"; }
00039 
00040     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00041     void EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair);
00042     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00043 
00044 private:
00045     HistogramNew histogram;
00046     double _min, _max;
00047     int _nbins;
00048     string _outfile;
00049 };
00050 
00051 inline void Ehistogram::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options){
00052     _min = options->get("options.ehistogram.min").as<double>();
00053     _max = options->get("options.ehistogram.max").as<double>();
00054     _nbins = options->get("options.ehistogram.nbins").as<int>();
00055     _outfile = options->get("options.ehistogram.file").as<string>();
00056 
00057     histogram.Initialize(_min,_max,_nbins);
00058 }
00059 
00060 inline void Ehistogram::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top){
00061     cout << "Writing Distribution of site energy differences to file " << _outfile << endl;
00062     histogram.data().Save(_outfile);
00063 }
00064 
00065 inline void Ehistogram::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair){
00066     double energy1 = pair->first->getTotalEnergy();
00067     double energy2 = pair->second->getTotalEnergy();
00068     histogram.Process( energy1-energy2 );
00069 }
00070 
00071 }}
